title: Wolf WiFi Pro Net Tools Demo
creator: Enterprising Apps

extendedInfo.description: - PCMag.com Editors' Choice award winner for network utilitiesIf you are a network administrator or a network engineer that has any WiFi / wireless on your network then you already know that you need a good WiFi network monitoring / analyzer tool or toolkit to properly manage and analyze inside your wireless network. Without the proper network tools you have no way to determine proper functionality of your WiFi network or identify security risk that comes with having wireless technology inside of your enterprise corporate LAN. As a network administrator or engineer you already have many other responsibilities with your network such as managing servers, routers, switches, workstations, inventory management, asset management, bandwidth monitoring, troubleshooting... the list is long. Make sure you have a tool that makes your wireless network management easier!- Active Passive Pre-Deployment and Site Survey and WiFi Analyzer network tools for wireless professionals. Works on 802.11 N, G, B, and A networks (Depends on device)Quickly perform wifi site surveys by simply double tapping on floor plan to register samples2.4Ghz and 5Ghz wifi analyzer fully supported in all wireless toolsWiFi HeatmapperWiFi AP Edge MapWiFi Channel MapWiFi StumblerWiFi AnalyzerAccess point filters allow you to analyze AP edge individuallyWireless security filters identify and analyze secure and non-secure (WEP, Ad-Hoc, Open) wireless networksSub-filters allow you to filter out weak WiFi coverage areasNetwork Icons for mapping out your hardwareExport all views for email or printingExport and Import all surveys for backup or to share with other techs using Wolf WiFi ProCreate multiple sitesSupports and analyze broadcast and hidden SSIDs (once known to device)Complete help documentation at www.wolfwifi.com and videos on www.youtube.com-WiFi Scanner and analyzer with summary view and detailed view-Channel Graph displays and analyze channels in use to easily identify congestion-Signal Tracker helps you track down access points and adjust antennas-802.11 A/B/G/N support (depends on device)Wolf WiFi Pro is an enterprise class accurate wireless toolkit and analyzer for wireless professionals. Wolf WiFi Pro goes far beyond just searching for WiFi networks, now you can perform full active passive pre-deployment and site surveys, import your own floor plans, and create heat maps. Use filters to identify Open, WEP, Ad Hoc and secure networks. Monitor active 802.11 channels to identify congestion. Device WiFi management. Network icon library allows you to place icons on your floor plan to identify location of network equipment.No PC software required. No Root required. If you like AirMagnet, Ekahau, Visiwave, Meritech, Netstumbler, inSSIDer, WiFi Analyzer, airmapper or Tamograph you will want to take a look at this app.App is actively in development. More features and tools are on the way. Please send us your suggestions. Let's make this the best mobile site survey and analyzer tool available. Support and documentation â Help is an email away at support@wolfwifi.com. Full documentation can also be found by going to the home screen in the app and clicking the menu button. Additional documentation can be found on our website at http://www.wolfwifi.com. Training videos for the app can be found on http://www.youtube.com search Wolf WiFi Pro.

reviews.title: As advertised ...
reviews.comment: Seems to be all it claims to be,  based on the (heavily restricted) demo. I\'ve used the PC version of Heatmapper and it was great, too! I can\'t justify $50 for a mobile app though. $15 or $20 tops...and that\'s a stretch.
reviews.author: Les McGowan

reviews.title: Looks good... does not work on S4
reviews.comment: Some functionality works. But nothing special. The site survey will not load jpgs from samsung gallery, causes app to crash. Other free apps do the same features that do function in this app on my main device.
reviews.author: Adam Olympian

reviews.comment: Utter crap.  15 minutes to evaluate?  Not even close.
reviews.author: Nunya Bidness

reviews.title: Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: Does not display properly on the GS4, presumably due to the high pixel density
reviews.author: Brent Hilgenkamp

reviews.title: demo
reviews.comment: wasting your time with this!
reviews.author: Voltz M

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.comment: Not worth the price and interface needs a lot if work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Y
reviews.comment: S
reviews.author: Yenugu Srinivasarao

reviews.title: Pointless Demo
reviews.comment: Waste of time
reviews.author: Colin Carter

reviews.title: Great tool. Good Value
reviews.comment: This is a great little app for the money. I\'m guessing that those complaining about the demo limitations have a real job to do somewhere and want the tool but are too miserable to pay for it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: crashes alot on nexus 7
reviews.comment: I would never purchase this program based on the demo. It constantly crashes. Won\'t load my small png floorplans at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish; not even worthwhile free
reviews.comment: Good grief this is a rubbish app. I would hope the $50 (!!) paid version is less pathetically botched together than this sorry excuse for a WiFi meter/map. The interface is nearly as poor as this app\'s lacking functionality.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay. Trial - All features, data points limited to 5.
reviews.comment: This is the trial version of the Wolf Wifi but it has all the mapping functions etc enabled.  However you are limited to one custom map (reasonable) but only 5 Data points (unreasonable) this should be raised to 10.  After frustration of trying to use those 5 Data points to get a good Idea for how well the app functions, I eventually got a vague impression of the app.  Big + UI lets you tap location on static image.  Bought $50 Full Version in the end, worth it if you plan to do a large area.
reviews.author: Ben Personick

reviews.title: Demo is awful
reviews.comment: If I\'m going to spend $50 on an app, I want to try out ALL features. A couple days of a FULL trial would be great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worst demo
reviews.comment: I would never purchase this program based on the demo.  It might be ok but the demo is so limited you have no idea what this can do.  Garbage....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Work great for my needs
reviews.comment: I have had issues with some of my floor plan images, but after using small ones I was able to test out the functionality and it fulfills my needs for documenting signal strength.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not worth it.
reviews.comment: Does not detect N band.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Josh
reviews.comment: Works better than I thought, thanks for putting out a demo to try.  Enterprise class indeed, exceeds the needs for my business in the paid version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent, almost replaces laptop for surveying
reviews.comment: Tried the free version, company now buying the full version. This app gives me at least 90% of the functionality I get using my laptop; if only it gave SNR &/or RSSI measurements I could leave the laptop at home.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Has excellent potential! It may even compare to bigger models like Fluke or Ekahau.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pathetic
reviews.comment: \"Enterprise class\" is a major overstatement. Very basic. Often hangs
reviews.author: A Google User
